title: PROBLEMS Answers to all odd-number problems are at the end of the book. Section 18–1 Programming Basics 1. What are the five basic instruction types? 2. Identify each of the flowchart symbols in Figure 18–25
Section 18–2 Automated Testing Basics 4. Identify each of indicated components in the automated test system in Figure 18–26
What are advantages of using electromechanical relays to connect the UUT to the test equipment and instrumentation in an automated test system? Section 18–3 The Simple Sequential Program
What is the process flow for a simple sequential program? 7. Does the flowchart shown in Figure 18–27 represent a simple sequential program? Justify your answer
